oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fredonia Baptist Church: interior
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 2711 Fredonia Road, Stanton, Haywood Co., TN
Color photograph of a church interior. Foreground of photo is a wood lectern and microphone; background is a painting of a waterfall surrounded by colorful trees and flowers

Fredonia Baptist Church dates back to 1867 when it was founded by Reverends Hardin Smith and Henry Owen. After a fire, the building was rebuilt in 1900. It also served as a school from 1900 to 1957. The church continues to serve spiritual needs and the Stanton community today and continues to be an integral part of the history of Stanton and Haywood County.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee; Church buildings -- Tennessee
Churches
